entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Halton Hills
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:09 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -7.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto Pearson Int'l Airport 12:32 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -7.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 6.4 km
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -8.0°C
Wind: NE 19 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday night: Ice pellets or snow. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy or ice pellets changing to ice pellets or freezing rain this evening. Local ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 6:34 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of freezing drizzle. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle or ice pellets. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning and minus 3 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:34 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle or drizzle ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 6:34 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
